name: Chameleon
text: As a changeling, you alter appearances and identities to suit your purpose. As a chameleon, you take versatility to a new level. You absorb the mannerisms and actions of those around you through careful observation. You not only change your appearance, you alter your powers and are able to perform an astonishing range of maneuvers. The more time you spend with a person, the more accurately you can mimic his or her actions and abilities.

features.coordinatedAction(11thLevel): If you have not already spent an action point in the encounter, when an ally spends an action point to take an extra action, you can spend an action point as an immediate reaction
features.shiftingSkill(11thLevel): During an extended rest, choose one skill in which an ally is trained
features.powerFocus(16thLevel): During a short rest, choose one of your allies’ class or paragon path encounter attack powers of 11th level or lower

flavorText: You can’t solve every problem with a hammer . . .
